structure.unit: AGRICULTURAL SEEDS, FEEDING STUFFS, AND FERTILIZERS

law.text: The director shall publish, at least annually, and in such forms as he may deem proper, information concerning the distribution of fertilizers and results of analyses based on official samples of fertilizer distributed within the state as compared with analyses guaranteed under KRS 250.371 and 250.376.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 12, effective July 13, 1984.
